author: Liam

text: There was nothing quite like being the last person standing in your team, knowing that all your teammates were spectating you, and still pulling it off to win the round. I think the game only has this main theme. No idea what I'd have done if it didn't have a single track!
author: SupraDarky

text: I played this and Source, on and off, for about 10 years. Probably about 2000 hours total. Some people didn't like Source, but to me it was just as good, so it's also my #22. I don't think I've ever been as addicted to a video game as this one. Many times I'd hop in to play a quick 30 mins and I'd end up playing hours. I did play competitively for a couple years too, but nothing too serious. I find this game requires the purest of skill when it comes to accuracy, it's a game of inches.
author: SupraDarky
